about_the_game:
URO's original soundtrack to send with 84 songs in music!
Available for. mp 3!

Soundtrack's song data is generated in the name of "URO2_OST" in your Steam Library and URO2 folder.

【DLC in Music】

name: URO2 Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: URO2's original soundtrack to send with 84 songs in music! Available for. mp 3!
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
